ygData.msgSnippet: Pardon the expression, but there is more than 1 way to skin a cat. What if the effect was speeding your team up, instead of slowing the other teams down?  It

Pardon the expression, but there is more than 1 way to skin a cat.

What if the effect was speeding your team up, instead of slowing the 
other teams down?  It would still have the same outcome: Team 1 
would be "faster" than the rest of the teams.  Would that be feasible 
just to speed a team up instead of slowing everybody else down?

But what would be a quick fix for the current situation?  Setting a 
max value for how long time can be frozen without having a break?
